FuncDef:
The local-aaa-server command displays the local AAA server view.
By default, the local AAA server view is not displayed.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enter the local AAA server view from the system view, run the local-aaa-server command. You can perform security configurations in the local AAA server view, such as configuring local users, setting local user level, restricting the maximum number of unsuccessful login attempts.
